name: Shandia Tribe

keyMoments.description: The Shandians make peace with Noland after learning the truth about Tree Fever
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tribe's ability to overcome cultural misunderstandings

keyMoments.description: The tribe rings the Golden Bell as a promise to Noland to guide him back
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the bell-ringing tradition that lasts 400 years

keyMoments.description: The tribe is sent to the sky by the Knock Up Stream and begins fighting the Skypieans
keyMoments.significance: Creates the 400-year war and displacement that defines the modern Shandia

keyMoments.description: Hidden Cloud Village is destroyed by Enel's lightning attack
keyMoments.significance: The Shandia lose their home once again to a sky tyrant

goals: Protect the Forest of Embodiment and honor their ancestors
Ring the Golden Bell to fulfill Kalgara's promise to Noland
Reclaim their homeland of Shandora from the Skypieans
history: The Shandia are the original inhabitants of Jaya who were sent to the sky 400 years ago by the Knock Up Stream. They have fought to reclaim their ancestral land of Shandora for four centuries, driven by the unfulfilled promise between Kalgara and Mont Blanc Noland.
status: Active, fighting to reclaim Shandora in Skypiea
